name: sum
shortDescription: checksum and count the blocks in a file
longDescription: Print checksum and block counts for each FILE.

options.name: r
options.description: Use the default (BSD compatible) algorithm.  This option is included for compatibility with the System V ‘sum’.  Unless ‘-s’ was also given, it has no effect.

options.name: sysv
options.description: Compute checksums using an algorithm compatible with System V ‘sum’’s default, and print file sizes in units of 512-byte blocks.
